title: The Digital Divide and AI Access
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Digital Divide and AI Access.

hook.text: AI tutors could transform education in rural Kenya. But there's no reliable internet.

buildup.text: AI benefits concentrate in wealthy nations and tech hubs, widening global inequality.

discovery.text: Languages like Swahili and Bengali have far fewer AI resources than English or Mandarin.

climax.text: The countries that need AI most may be the last to get it.

punchline.text: AI amplifies what you have. If you have little, it amplifies that too.
